@ BRSX

That's because the game has not been able to extract fully on your rig. Delete the current game. Re-install it using the Install.exe file provided and don't stop or delete it half-way. Select a directory where there's near about 20 GiGs of free space. Remember to close your anti-virus software (in case of false-positives) and any other programs while installing. Hope this helps.

Peace
